It's an alright game, only found it enjoyable when playing with friends, 70% of the players/community hack.
Picking between a thumbs up and a thumbs down was honestly a hard decision but this lacks all kinds of realism, which realism is what i'm honestly chasing.
In conclusion: Not really worth installing if you don't have friends to enjoy it with, i HIGHLY suggest you purchase/download and install a game called "Hell Let Loose".

Regards.
